claim: Despicable Me was animated by Mikros Image.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film is being produced by Rocket Pictures , Paramount Animation and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer , with the animation service provided by Paris-based Mikros Image .

claim: Despicable Me was animated by Mikros Image.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film is being produced by DreamWorks Animation and Scholastic Entertainment with animation production provided by Mikros Image .
